Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are calling for a major increase in JobSeeker payments as we approach next month's federal budget. Treasurer Jim Chalmers is facing the pressure to raise the rate by thousands of dollars to alleviate financial stress on those relying on unemployment benefits. Alongside this a group of 11 fishermen were rescued off the coast of Western Australia after being stranded for days without food or water. Meanwhile the Reserve Bank of New Zealand is being debated for possibly doing too much in efforts to slow down the economy. The Australian share market also closed lower following the RBA's announcement of this month's interest rate decision being a close call.
